thread.title: TIBCO Software Announces Deeper Partnership With DEFTeam Solutions
thread.title_full: TIBCO Software Announces Deeper Partnership With DEFTeam Solutions

author: admin
title: TIBCO Software Announces Deeper Partnership With DEFTeam Solutions
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: TIBCO Software Inc. 
PALO ALTO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 09/08/15 -- TIBCO Software Inc. , a global leader in integration, analytics, and event processing, today announced DEFTeam Solutions as an authorized TIBCO training partner, helping to expand its presence in the Middle East and Asia Pacific markets. DEFTeam Solutions, a Big Data, Business Intelligence, and Predictive Analytics-focused company that supports end-to-end Business Intelligence (BI) and Predictive Analytics solutions, is a long-term TIBCO reseller and SI partner. DEFTeam enables users to support the complete TIBCO® Analytics product set -- including TIBCO Jaspersoft®, TIBCO Spotfire® and the predictive analytics engine TIBCO® Enterprise Runtime for R -- as well as TIBCO StreamBase®. 
"DEFTeam is a long-standing, valuable partner of TIBCO Analytics, expanding the reach for both our Jaspersoft® and Spotfire® platforms in various markets," said Paul Kochanski, director, global channels, TIBCO Analytics. "DEFTeam has developed deep competencies and has built a number of extensions to the Jaspersoft platform, which enhances our full feature set so a real solution can be tailored to a specific client's needs. We look forward to a continuing strategic relationship with DEFTeam." 
"We are excited to work with TIBCO. The partnership provides us with the required technology capability to deliver single-vendor solutions using ETL, production reporting/dashboards, self-service visualizations, and predictive analytics using the various solutions of the TIBCO Analytics platform," safid Gurpreet Singh, CEO, DEFTeam Solutions. 
TIBCO is a strategic technology partner trusted by businesses around the world due to its broad mix of innovative products and services. As a result, DEFTeam has already expanded into the Middle East and US, and also plans to extend its reach in terms of reselling, supporting, and providing consulting services on the TIBCO Analytics platform to South Africa, Australia, and New Zealand. 
According to Joseph Cincotta, CEO and President of DoubleCheck, a leading provider of GRC Enterprise Software Solutions, "DEFTeam provides DoubleCheck with a valuable extension to our development team by providing a broad range of talent pertaining to our integration of the TIBCO Jaspersoft BI platform. We selected the Jaspersoft platform based on its features, performance and ability to be effectively integrated into our environment. There are significant advantages to an embedded BI solution within an Enterprise GRC application and the Jaspersoft platform, along with the extensive product knowledge and software development skills, provided by DEFTeam, assured us an accelerated development schedule and shortened time to market." 
Cincotta further adds, "There are many alternatives for off-shore development providers, but few if any that have the commitment, knowledge, and experience unique and required for a successful complex BI integration project. This is why TIBCO and DEFTeam are an ideal combination." 
About TIBCO TIBCO Software empowers executives, developers, and business users with Fast Data solutions that make the right data available in real time for faster answers, better decisions, and smarter action. Over the past 15 years, thousands of businesses across the globe have relied on TIBCO technology to integrate their applications and ecosystems, analyze their data, and create real-time solutions. Learn how TIBCO turns data -- big or small -- into differentiation at www.tibco.com. 
About DEFTeam DEFTeam -- a Red Herring Global 100 and a Silicon India 2013 100 company -- provides subscription support; consulting and System Integration services for an end-to-end custom built Data Warehouse, Business Intelligence (BI) and Predictive Analytics solution based upon business requirements -- both in-premise and on-cloud. We utilize open source, Enterprise and in-memory BI and analytical tools to architect a solution that utilizes "best of breed" features of tools and tames structured and unstructured "Big Data" (Hadoop, Columnar databases and Data appliances) to provide a lower TCO but feature rich solution. We offer managed onsite-offshore delivery model that leverages labor arbitrage and which can be tailored to achieve even 100% offshore delivery. Visit www.defteam.com to get more details. 
TIBCO, Spotfire, Jaspersoft, StreamBase, and the TIBCO logo are trademarks or registered trademarks of TIBCO Software Inc. and/or its subsidiaries in the United States and/or other countries.
